rows.label: qst200904_msg001
rows.name:
First things first, we'll need the
windmill running if we want to open
shop again.

rows.label: qst200904_msg002
rows.name:
Otto should be at Saets Lumber Co.,
near the town entrance.

rows.label: qst200904_msg003
rows.name:
You might have to ask around if he's
not there. Could you have a look?
